org.eMayor.FormatTransformation.ejb
Class TransformationTemplate

java.lang.Object
  org.eMayor.FormatTransformation.ejb.TransformationTemplate
Direct Known Subclasses:
XMLTransformationTemplate
public abstract class TransformationTemplate
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents an abstract transformation template. Specific TransformationTemplates (e.g. an XSLT template) shall extend this one, as for example XMLTransformationTemplate.

Author:
AlexK
